Package com.dougnoel.sentinel.elements.dropdowns

Class PrimeNGDropdown

java.lang.Object
com.dougnoel.sentinel.elements.Element
com.dougnoel.sentinel.elements.dropdowns.SelectElement
com.dougnoel.sentinel.elements.dropdowns.Dropdown
com.dougnoel.sentinel.elements.dropdowns.JSDropdownElement
com.dougnoel.sentinel.elements.dropdowns.PrimeNGDropdown
public class PrimeNGDropdown
extends JSDropdownElement
Implementation of an NGPrime Dropdown.
See Also:
PrimeNG Dropdown

Page Object Examples:

  • public PrimeNGDropdown city_dropdown() { return new PrimeNGDropdown(XPATH, "//p-dropdown[1]"); }
  • public PrimeNGDropdown state_dropdown() { return new PrimeNGDropdown(ID, "state"); }
  • public PrimeNGDropdown airport_dropdown() { return new PrimeNGDropdown(NAME, "airport"); }

  • Constructor Details

    • PrimeNGDropdown

      public PrimeNGDropdown​(java.lang.String elementName, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> selectors)
      Implementation of a JSDropdownElement to initialize how an element is going to be found when it is worked on by the WebDriver class. Takes a reference to the WebDriver class that will be exercising its functionality.
      Parameters:
      elementName - String the name of the element
      selectors - Map<String,String> the list of selectors to use to find the element
